title: Massive NPC Sounds Pack
description: The ultimate dialogue library for extra characters populating your world. Includes dozens of different settings, and characters to work with.
longDescription:
🔊 Listen to the Preview Here

📄 Check the File List

📄 CHECK THE OTHER PART OF THE PRODUCT!

Ever wondered when looking at the graceful games, why do they look so captivating? This is the merit of sounds! In Ishodus Studio we specialize in the development and creation of the sounds you need to fill your game world with new colors. We have created a whole set of sounds such as environments, characters, monsters, interactions, weapons, gore, footsteps, and more to make your project sound amazing.


The perfect solution to giving your character a voice to be heard. Great for ANY TYPE OF GAME, and includes dozens of variations for every NPC in your world.


This pack it's a part of our character sounds series that contains 2200 high-quality and Triple AAA quality sounds of NPC like Dialogues, Bosses, Bandits, Advanced Races, Post-Apocalyptic world, Merchants, Inn, Modern City,Â Primative races, Port Town, Childrens, Townsfolk, Mages, Sirens and more for your ANY TYPE OF GAME!


📄 Includes 10 voices, 3 categories of sounds and hundred of different types phrases - each voice has over 220 sounds for any action in your game, with his own style and a lot of variations📄

📄 Categories:📄

  • Merchants - Armor Shop, Dark Magic Shop, General Merchant, Holy Magic Shop, Inn, Shady Merchant, Travel all in 10 different voice variations.
  • Townsfolk - Advanced Race, ColdClimate Mountain, General, Hidden Creature Village, Modern City, Port Town, Post Apocalyptic, Primative Race, Vacation Town, Warm Climate, Wartorn Tower all in 10 different voice variations.
  • Enemies - Bandits, Bosses, Dark Knights, Dark Mages, Siren Witches all in 10 different voice variations.


BRING LIFE TO YOUR WORLD WITH - Massive NPC Sounds Pack!
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 2200

Number of Audio Cues: 2200

Sample rate / bit rate: 96000 Hz/ 1536 kbps

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 90 minutes, 1 hour 30 minutes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://soundcloud.com/tt-production-853368438/npc-sounds-pack?si=6c4c217fd6c24dd8bd5f7184f3770178&utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=social_sharing

Important/Additional Notes: This sounds can be used in ANY GAME GENRE. Thank for your interest in this!
